title: Charles Drury's scathing remark about Katie Price 'sleeping with married men'
text:

Katie Price's toyboy builder ex Charles Drury has posted a savage Instagram story about her.

He re-posted a quote which slammed unfaithful partners amid his explosive new claims that Katie cheated on him.

The quote said: "Sleeping alone is better than sharing your bed with someone who shares their bed with someone else".

Charles, 22, added a scathing remark underneath which said: "Especially when they are married to someone else."

Katie Price had reportedly dumped her ex-fiancé Kris Boyson for Charles.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

But their fling was short-lived and Charles has now told all about Katie's erratic behaviour.

He claimed Katie was cheating on him with famous married men and that he saw messages pop up on her screen.

He told The Sun: "When she was with me she was definitely talking to people and arranging to meet up with them, I used to see the messages pop up.

"There are a few famous people who are married."

(Image: Brett D. Cove / Splash News)

He also claims that on the first night they met, they binged on drugs and drink before sleeping together hours later.

Their relationship came to an end when Charles saw pictures of her leaving Kris' house.

Katie previously admitted to taking cocaine weekly for six months as she struggled to cope with her mum's terminal illness and ex husband Kieran's cheating.

(Image: charlesdrury1/Instagram)

She had checked into rehab and was treated for trauma and depression.

A spokesperson for Katie Price said: "There is no truth in the allegation that she is taking drugs every day and has made significant steps to being drug free - there have been lapses in the past but they are just that, not a regular event.

"Katie is still in recovery and making progress."

Mirror Online have contacted a representative for Katie for comment.
description: Katie Price's ex has accused her of cheating on him with married men in a string of shocking claims
